content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0 y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0 y=-80.0)
-  Burner inserter (position x=39.5 y=-79.5) 
-  Burner inserter (position x=41.5 y=-78.5) 

### Copper plate mine at position(x=60.0 y=-60.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Stone furnace (position x=60.0 y=-60.0)

### Electricity generator at position(x=106.5 y=-32.5)
Consists of following entities
-  Offshore pump (position x=106.5 y=-32.5)
-  Boiler (position x=111.5 y=-32.0)
-  Steam engine (position x=117.5 y=-30.5)
-  Pipe group (position x=107.5 y=-34.5)
-  Pipe group (position x=105.5 y=-32.5)

### Transport belt system at position(x=40.5 y=-83.5)
Consists of following entities
-  Belt group (position x=40.5 y=-83.5)
-  Transport belt (position x=63.5 y=-53.5)
-  Transport belt (position x=64.5 y=-53.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner entities without fuel
-  Ensure that burner entities have fuel before using them
### Errors when using entities without ingredients
-  Ensure that entities have the required ingredients before using them
### Errors when using steam engine without connection
-  Ensure that the steam engine is connected to a power network before using it
### Errors when using electricity group without being plugged in electric network
-  Ensure that the electricity group is plugged into an electric network before using it
### Errors when using pipe group without fluid
-  Ensure that the pipe group has fluid before using it
### Errors when using belt group without items
-  Ensure that the belt group has items before using it

### NAMESPACE
*Important variables:*
- `x` and `y` coordinates for entity positions
- `EntityStatus` for entity statuses
*Utility functions:*
- `get_entity_position(entity)` to get the position of an entity
- `get_entity_status(entity)` to get the status of an entity
*Failure and success modes:*
- Failure: When an entity is used without the required fuel, ingredients, or connections
- Success: When an entity is used with the required fuel, ingredients, and connections
